epigraphdb 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Using epigraphdb
  • Changelog

    EpiGraphDB

    Installation

    devtools is required to install from IEU gitlab

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_git(
  "git@ieugit-scmv-d0.epi.bris.ac.uk:epigraphdb/epigraphdb-r.git",
  git = "external"
)

    Example

    library("epigraphdb")
#>   EpiGraphDB v0.2
#>   Please cite: PLACEHOLDER.
#> 
#>   To turn off this message, use
#>   suppressPackageStartupMessages({library("epigraphdb")})
mr(outcome = "Body mass index")
#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
#> # A tibble: 19 x 5
#>    exposure               outcome                estimate      se         p
#>    <chr>                  <chr>                     <dbl>   <dbl>     <dbl>
#>  1 Waist circumference    Body mass index          1.01   4.04e-2 2.11e-137
#>  2 Overweight             Body mass index          0.551  2.85e-2 4.20e- 83
#>  3 Hip circumference      Body mass index          0.874  4.76e-2 1.82e- 75
#>  4 Obesity class 2        Body mass index          0.256  1.58e-2 4.80e- 59
#>  5 Hip circumference      Extreme body mass ind…   3.5    2.88e-1 6.73e- 34
#>  6 Obesity class 2        Extreme body mass ind…   1.12   1.07e-1 1.22e- 25
#>  7 Body mass index        Extreme body mass ind…   3.90   2.73e-1 5.71e- 23
#>  8 HDL cholesterol        Body mass index         -0.0347 2.98e-3 4.14e- 19

#> 11 Childhood obesity      Body mass index          0.158  6.35e-4 4.45e- 15

#> 13 Overweight             Extreme body mass ind…   2.22   1.03e-1 1.49e- 11
#> 14 Extreme body mass ind… Body mass index          0.212  1.88e-3 3.29e- 11
